name: Runes Legacy
longDescription:
We created "Runes Legacy" to provide a platform for the community to explore and discuss the latest insights and developments in the world of Runes. We aim to provide a supportive environment for enthusiasts and newcomers alike, offer a space for discussion and collaboration.

We want to make the topic easy and fun to understand, and we are committed to providing the latest news and insights to our community. We believe that the more people understand the potential of Runes, the more they will be able to contribute to the development of the ecosystem.

We are excited to have you join us on this journey and look forward to exploring Runes together!

name: Runestone
description: Ordinals project blending art, technology, and community.
longDescription:
The Runestones project, initiated by Leonidas with collaboration from OrdinalsBot and Marathon Digital Holdings, is an innovative ordinals collection designed to be airdropped to 112,383 wallets. This unique digital art collection, crafted by the talented Leo Caillard, marks a significant event in the blockchain community by being part of the two largest inscriptions made to date, each nearly 3.97 MB.

The parent inscription and the Runestone itself were inscribed, setting new records for size within the Bitcoin blockchain. To qualify for the airdrop, owners needed to have three inscriptions in block 826,600, with specific format exclusions.

This groundbreaking project not only showcases the capabilities of digital art on the blockchain but also provides a unique opportunity for collectors and enthusiasts to be part of a historic moment in cryptocurrency.

name: Runecoin
description: RSIC: A PEER-TO-PEER RUNE ALLOCATION SYSTEM
longDescription:
Rune Specific Inscription Circuits (RSIC) is an ordinals collection with 21k inscriptions in total. The goal is to hold these ordinals to "mine" the upcoming token launch the project has planned. For every Bitcoin block, a number of tokens will be allocated to the holders.

The project launched on 20th January 2024 and has distributed all 21k ordinals to the community for free.

To learn more about the exact details of the mining process, click "On-Chain Docs" down below.

name: The Rune Guardians
description: ᛊ. Partake in our massive ᛊ100,000,000,000 Rune airdrop.
longDescription:
The Rune Guardians: Protectors of mystical runes.

This elite 10k Collection, magically airdropped to Guardian Masters across the Ordinal Universe, bridges the guardians with their celestial duty.

Tap into your Guardian to unveil your rune balance, a reflection of your bond with the ancient elements.

Each block heralds new rewards, celebrating the symbiosis of Guardians and the sacred runes they safeguard.

name: Runes Terminal
longDescription:
Runesterminal is a platform enhancing the Runes ecosystem by providing tools and support. It offers a Runes explorer (RunesScan), token creation without coding (RunesEtcher), and a launchpad (Runespad) for developers and teams. It simplifies app development on the Runes Protocol, facilitates token creation, provides expert advice, and connects users with a Runes developer community. Additionally, it offers funding access and marketing support for projects.

Its infrastructure includes Runes Explorer, a token issuer, and Runespad, which integrates liquidity from EVM chains into Bitcoin. Runespad supports vetted and non-vetted projects, aiming to enhance Web3 innovation and facilitate cross-blockchain fundraising.

The platform is launching a 5k Ordinals collection to mine $RUNI tokens pre-Runes Protokol launch, with different species mining at varied rates. $RUNI is key for community engagement, offering access to tools, investment opportunities, and governance, linking holders with an investor and developer network.

name: Bitcoin Burials
description: 20k Ordinals, mining & lore, same artist as Bitcoin Frogs.
longDescription:
Bitcoin Burials and Boneys present an innovative blend of art, history, and blockchain utility, reflecting the resilience and spirit of the Bitcoin ecosystem. Our project begins with Bitcoin Burials, a collection of 10k pixel-art headstones, each marking a false prediction of Bitcoin's end. This series not only showcases Bitcoin's durability but also humorously notes the frequent misjudgments of its demise.

The narrative deepens with our 10k Boneys collection, where playful, mischievous skeletons, arising from the very criticisms that sought to bury Bitcoin, symbolize the community's enduring spirit and collective defiance against skepticism.

Adding to the allure, we have collaborated on both Bitcoin Burials and Boneys with the artist who gave you Bitcoin Frogs. This partnership ensures the continuation of distinctive, engaging art that has already captured the community's imagination.

The uniqueness of our project extends into the realm of rune mining. That can be achieved by collectors pairing their Boneys with Burials, offering an immersive, engaging experience. Here, the synergy between Boneys and their corresponding Burials becomes crucial: pairs with rare traits or where the Boney emerged from its specific corresponding Burial enhance mining multipliers, deepening the connection between collector actions and Bitcoin's history.

By integrating distinctive traits from both collections, we emphasize not just the narrative depth but also the strategic engagement required in the rune mining process. This system encourages collectors to explore the intertwining stories of their Boneys and Burials, promoting a richer, more interactive community experience rooted in the lore and resilience of Bitcoin.

name: Elemental Runes
longDescription:
At the launch of Runes Protocol on Block 840000, wizardz will etch early Runes and airdrop 31% supply to Elemental Summoners. The remaining 69% will be distributed via public mint during peak demand for Runes. By holding Elemental Runes you will avoid imminent mempool fees & bypass max mint limits, securing your allocation of early Runes on Bitcoin.

Etched Runes allocation tracking begins on block 835000, with 5000 blocks remaining until halving block 840000. All runes summoned from block 835000 until Elemental Runes collection is Sold Out will be distributed to Elemental Runes minters & wizardz as a Mint Bonus allocation. The Elemental Runes collection will be fully inscribed on Alpha & Omega Sats as children of this Runepaper inscription.

name: Game Of Blocks
longDescription:
Game of Blocks (GOB) is a captivating new game in the Ordinal space, created by a mysterious yet highly skilled team. This innovative game blends strategy and chance across blockchain technology, allowing players to engage with their "gobs" in a unique and interactive way. Starting at block 836144, GOB invites players to participate in a thrilling journey of re-inscribing the word "gob" onto their ordinal, risking their gobs for potential high rewards, or choosing a safer path by doing nothing and watching their gobs multiply. With hints at a connection to the intriguing MIME token and strategies that revolve around the timing of your actions, GOB offers an exciting new adventure for blockchain enthusiasts and gamers alike.

Game of Blocks (GOB) Summary:
1. Gameplay Start: Begins at block 836144.
2. Phase 1 Duration: 8 tiers, each 144 blocks long, totaling 1,152 blocks (~1 week).
3. Actions: Players can either re-inscribe 'gob' on their ordinal or do nothing.
- Re-inscribing: Risks gob being frozen or dying. Odds of freezing improve each tier.
- Do Nothing: Gobs split, doubling at the end of each tier.
4. Phase 1 Outcome:
- If re-inscribing wins, gob freezes and doesn't split further.
- Doing nothing leads to 256 gobs on an ordinal by the end.
5. MIME Yield: Related to gob tier; higher yield for lower tiers. Starts at 42,690,000 for genesis tier, roughly halves each tier.
6. Strategy: Aim for lower tier to secure higher MIME yield, involves risk.

Check out their Documentation down below to dive into the details.
